author: woonsan
msg: Fixed a bug of auto-dispatching option. The problem was that a portlet can show edit_defaults icon when it does not even EDIT mode.
DecoratorValve now checks if a portlet supports edit mode in auto-dispatching option.
Also, two edit pages for bookmark portlets are updated because the edit pages can be used for both edit and edit_defaults mode now.

author: rajdavies
msg: FilePendingMessageCursor was being added twice to the MemoryUsage
which resulted in a memory leak
